name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D DEBUT】SPIN TO WIN!!!!!!! The C in Cece stands for cars？ #Cece3D [LD6f_6w2q7g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Cece discusses the 'Gear of Emotion' for laziness and checks poll results.
Cece transitions to the emotion of 'Hate' and lists her pet peeves.
Cece concludes the performance and realizes she misread the poll.

subtitles.original:
What should we do now?
a) Let's just not do anything...
b) You decide...
subtitles.english:
What should we do now?
a) Let's just not do anything...
b) You decide...

subtitles.original: But yeah, ultimate laziness is when you don't do anything.
subtitles.english: But yeah, ultimate laziness is when you don't do anything.

subtitles.original: Oh, you have deadlines? Meh.
subtitles.english: Oh, you have deadlines? Meh.

subtitles.original: Oh, you have really important things to do? Procrastinate.
subtitles.english: Oh, you have really important things to do? Procrastinate.

subtitles.original: Oh, things are coming up in your calendar? Meh, forget about it.
subtitles.english: Oh, things are coming up in your calendar? Meh, forget about it.

subtitles.original: Everything's messy and it's the worst it's ever been in your room?
subtitles.english: Everything's messy and it's the worst it's ever been in your room?

subtitles.original: Meh, forget about it too. Just stay in bed and do absolutely nothing.
subtitles.english: Meh, forget about it too. Just stay in bed and do absolutely nothing.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I think that's really important.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I think that's really important.

subtitles.original: And it's very, very important that you learn how to do that...
subtitles.english: And it's very, very important that you learn how to do that...

subtitles.original: ...because that's one of the many emotions of being a human.
subtitles.english: ...because that's one of the many emotions of being a human.

subtitles.original: Okay, let's see, what's the poll result?
subtitles.english: Okay, let's see, what's the poll result?

subtitles.original: What's the poll result? Hmm... Hmm...
subtitles.english: What's the poll result? Hmm... Hmm...

subtitles.original: Let's just not do anything.
subtitles.english: Let's just not do anything.

subtitles.original: Wow, Otomos are so smart.
subtitles.english: Wow, Otomos are so smart.

subtitles.original: Okay, don't do anything.
subtitles.english: Okay, don't do anything.

subtitles.original: And we... (laughs)
subtitles.english: And we... (laughs)

subtitles.original: That's exactly it. I'm so proud of you Otomo.
subtitles.english: That's exactly it. I'm so proud of you Otomo.

subtitles.original: That's how you learn, that's how you learn laziness and how to be lazy.
subtitles.english: That's how you learn, that's how you learn laziness and how to be lazy.

subtitles.original: Oh, there it is! There's the gear of emotion.
subtitles.english: Oh, there it is! There's the gear of emotion.

subtitles.original: Okay... He's taking it in. Oh...
subtitles.english: Okay... He's taking it in. Oh...

subtitles.original: Cute! Oh, that's so...
subtitles.english: Cute! Oh, that's so...

subtitles.original: Wait, no, no, no, no, no, no...
subtitles.english: Wait, no, no, no, no, no, no...

subtitles.original: Anyways, so, what is the next emotion that we need to learn?
subtitles.english: Anyways, so, what is the next emotion that we need to learn?

subtitles.original: Obviously, what is human if not...
subtitles.english: Obviously, what is human if not...

subtitles.original: ...okay, so we have joy, lazy...
subtitles.english: ...okay, so we have joy, lazy...

subtitles.original: ...and the next one is obviously...
subtitles.english: ...and the next one is obviously...

subtitles.original: Hate.
subtitles.english: Hate.

subtitles.original: So, no, come back Otomo, it's okay. I'll tell you a little bit about the things that I hate.
subtitles.english: So, no, come back Otomo, it's okay. I'll tell you a little bit about the things that I hate.

subtitles.original: So, I hate... hmm... Okay, okay, okay, listen.
subtitles.english: So, I hate... hmm... Okay, okay, okay, listen.

subtitles.original: I hate coffee. I hate raisins.
subtitles.english: I hate coffee. I hate raisins.

subtitles.original: I hate green peas. I hate olives on pizza.
subtitles.english: I hate green peas. I hate olives on pizza.

subtitles.original: I hate when something stops working and suddenly starts working again when you turn it off and on again.
subtitles.english: I hate when something stops working and suddenly starts working again when you turn it off and on again.

subtitles.original: I hate long queues. I hate waiting.
subtitles.english: I hate long queues. I hate waiting.

subtitles.original: I hate when I can't sleep at night.
subtitles.english: I hate when I can't sleep at night.

subtitles.original: I hate when the pillow is too warm and the blanket's too warm.
subtitles.english: I hate when the pillow is too warm and the blanket's too warm.

subtitles.original: But then you take off the blanket but then it's too cold and then you have to put the blanket back on.
subtitles.english: But then you take off the blanket but then it's too cold and then you have to put the blanket back on.

subtitles.original: And I hate when they make updates for programs and websites that are absolute downgrades.
subtitles.english: And I hate when they make updates for programs and websites that are absolute downgrades.

subtitles.original: Okay. Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay. Okay.

subtitles.original: And you know what I also hate Otomo?
subtitles.english: And you know what I also hate Otomo?

subtitles.original: The fact that I prepared a lot of stuff for today, but you...
subtitles.english: The fact that I prepared a lot of stuff for today, but you...

subtitles.original: ...and you, made it so that I crashed and I came into this world...
subtitles.english: ...and you, made it so that I crashed and I came into this world...

subtitles.original: ...and now I can't prepare it, I mean, show it to you.
subtitles.english: ...and now I can't prepare it, I mean, show it to you.

subtitles.original: But maybe I should show you anyways.
subtitles.english: But maybe I should show you anyways.

subtitles.original: Okay, I'll show you. I'll show you anyways.
subtitles.english: Okay, I'll show you. I'll show you anyways.

subtitles.original: It's fine. I mean, this is a circular stage.
subtitles.english: It's fine. I mean, this is a circular stage.

subtitles.original: Okay, Otomos, please listen.
subtitles.english: Okay, Otomos, please listen.

subtitles.original:
薔薇の誓い
Music: 光宗信吉
subtitles.english:
Oath of the Rose
Music: Shinkichi Mitsumune

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: That was Bara no Chikai from Revolutionary Girl Utena OST.
subtitles.english: That was Bara no Chikai from Revolutionary Girl Utena OST.

subtitles.original: I love it, I love that OST, it's one of my favorite OSTs.
subtitles.english: I love it, I love that OST, it's one of my favorite OSTs.

subtitles.original: Oh, what? What? Huh?
subtitles.english: Oh, what? What? Huh?

subtitles.original: Oh, sorry, I just got a message.
subtitles.english: Oh, sorry, I just got a message.

subtitles.original: Oh, apparently I read the poll wrong earlier and it was actually "You decide".
subtitles.english: Oh, apparently I read the poll wrong earlier and it was actually "You decide".

subtitles.original: My bad guys.
subtitles.english: My bad guys.

subtitles.original: I decide what to do next.
subtitles.english: I decide what to do next.
